HEADLINE:
Sub.: Transcript of Q2 FY 22 Earnings Call

Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 read with clause 15 of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby confirm that we have uploaded the transcript of the Q2 FY 22 Earnings Call held on Wednesday, October 27, 2021 on our Investor Website https://investors.larsentoubro.com/Download.aspx

We request you to take note and host the same on your website.
